title: GPU-as-a-Service
description: Elastic, multi-tenant, sovereign EU GPU clusters with on-demand, reserved & dedicated options. Support for NVIDIA H100, L40S, and MI300 (roadmap).

title: Model Catalog & Registry
description: Curated, validated models with provenance tracking, versioning, bias & drift checks, and enterprise distribution controls.

title: Secure AI Lab
description: Isolated experiment workspaces with governed data access, notebook runtimes, lineage capture, and SOC2/HIPAA-aligned controls.

title: AI Studio Apps
description: Low-code / pro-code environment to assemble RAG apps, copilots, dashboards, and vertical accelerators with enterprise SSO & audit.

title: LLM API Access
description: Central token brokering for internal & 3rd-party LLMs with usage policies, cost caps, key rotation, and audit-ready logging.
ariaLabel: LLM API access and token management

title: Data Fabric & Governance
description: Unified data ingestion, transformation, and access layers with sensitive data masking, encryption, and immutable audit logs.
